author.name: tvN
author.bio: A South Korean nationwide pay television network owned by the E&M Division of CJ E&M.

node.title: Hospital Playlist
node.excerpt: Five doctors who've been friends since medical school go through the ups and downs of their job in Yulje Medical Center, all while sharing their love for music by forming a band.

node.title: Start-Up
node.excerpt: The series revolves around a woman who has dreams of becoming an entrepreneur like Steve Jobs, and her love triangle between a man who is secretly her first love and another man who is pretending to be her first love.

node.title: Vincenzo
node.excerpt: Vincenzo Cassano, a South Korean-born Mafia lawyer in Italy, flees to his homeland after he finds himself caught in between two warring factions.

node.title: Hotel del Luna
node.excerpt: The peculiar Hotel del Luna has existed for several millennia catering to lost souls. It's CEO, Jang Man Wol, is cursed to run the establishment for all of eternity as punishment for a sin she can't remember.

node.title: Goblin
node.excerpt: A romantic fantasy drama, the series follows the story of a 939-year-old Goblin, also known as the Protector of Souls, as he ends up falling for the girl destined to end his cursed immortal life.
